page.title: 14Employment in Montrose.
page.content: Nationally,{unemployment}is of great concern but the Montrose area has only {12.8%}of adults without a job. In a {survey}taken of 46{Dads}of P6 children in{Borrowfield, Montrose,}there was only one who was unemployed. 15 were in{oil related jobs,}6 in the building industry, 4 professional men, and 1 self employed (shop owner). The remaining 20 included a milkman, a policeman, a car mechanic, lorry driver, and crane driver. There was a total of 21 different jobs for Dads. Out of 45{Mums,}there were 16 types of employment including 16 housewives, 8 shop assistants, 4 office staff, 3 cleaners,and 3 involved with child care. The other 14 ranged from dental assistant, hairdresser to lollipop lady. The high rate of employment in the area would seem to be due to the continued expansion of North Sea Oil.
